page.title: 18Events of 1985
page.content: { {The Carnival}takes place every year, the Saturday after the Cheese Show. there are many different floats that go through the town. The main carnival is in the evening and there is one for children in the afternoon. {Cheese Show:}It is held on the 3rd. Wednesday in September on the showfield and organised by the local Agricultural Society. Once cheese was an inportant part of the show,now there are demonstrations craft and art competitions etc. It is the biggest one day show in the West country. {Frome 1300:}The celebrations started on May 25th. St. Aldhelm's Day. There are lots of events during the summer e.g. special carnival, medieval fair, band contest, art & craft exhibitions, concerts, & sports events. by Angela Jackson & Alison Wheeler
